v_work_order_id = #{vWorkOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where v_work_order_maintenance_detail_id = #{vWorkOrderMaintenanceDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update tbl_work_order_maintenance_detail set i_history_detail_flag = 1 where v_work_order_id = #{workOrderId}

mapper.select: SELECT md.v_work_order_maintenance_detail_id AS workOrderMaintenanceDetailId, m.v_maintenance_definition_id AS maintenanceDetailId, m.v_maintenance_name AS maintenanceName, m.v_maintenance_claim AS maintenanceClaim, md.i_result AS result FROM tbl_work_order_maintenance_detail AS md LEFT JOIN tbl_maintenance_definition AS m ON md.v_maintenance_definition_id = m.v_maintenance_definition_id WHERE v_work_order_detail_id = #{workOrderDetailId}

SELECT md.v_work_order_maintenance_detail_id AS workOrderMaintenanceDetailId, m.v_maintenance_definition_id AS maintenanceDetailId, m.v_maintenance_name AS maintenanceName, m.v_maintenance_claim AS maintenanceClaim, md.i_result AS result FROM tbl_work_order_maintenance_detail AS md LEFT JOIN tbl_maintenance_definition AS m ON md.v_maintenance_definition_id = m.v_maintenance_definition_id WHERE v_work_order_id = #{workOrderId} AND i_history_detail_flag = 0
